author: Team Latestly
title: Delhi Weather Update: Sudden Dust and Thunderstorms Hit Delhi and NCR, Forecast of Gusty Winds With Speed of 50-70 Kmph by IMD | üì∞ LatestLY
text: A major dust storm hit Delhi-NCR on Friday evening with residents reporting power outage in their areas. Residents shared videos of sudden dust storm and thunderstorm slamming several parts of Delhi-NCR. In its weather forecast, the India Meteorological Department or IMD has also predicted dust storm with rain and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km/hour over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR including Ghaziabad, Noida and Gurugram. Delhi Weather Update: National Capital Records 14.7 Degrees Celsius As Minimum Temperature, AQI in ‚ÄòPoor‚Äô Category. Delhi Weather Update India Meteorological Department tweets, "Duststorm/ thunderstorm with rain (followed by rain) and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km/h would occur over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR (Loni Dehat, Hindon AF Station, Ghaziabad, Indirapuram, Chhapraula, Noida, Dadri,‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/tlR68iroOO ‚Äî ANI (@ANI) May 10, 2024 Major dust storm in Delhi pic.twitter.com/PLrsKD2x5Z ‚Äî ü¶è Payal M/‡™™‡™æ‡™Ø‡™≤ ‡™Æ‡´á‡™π‡™§‡™æ/ ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§π‡§§‡§æ/ ‡¶™‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡ßá‡¶≤ ‡¶Æ‡ßá‡¶π‡¶§‡¶æ (@payalmehta100) May 10, 2024 Wth is happening in Delhi right now? This Dust Storm came out of nowhere Hope everyone‚Äôs fine pic.twitter.com/5DK0wzJhba ‚Äî ShauryaüëÄ (@anythingtbf) May 10, 2024 Massive dust storm in Delhi . Complete power shutdown. Please stay safe. pic.twitter.com/DrVaHQfBuU ‚Äî Barkha Trehan üáÆüá≥ / ‡§¨‡§∞‡§ñ‡§æ ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§π‡§® (@barkhatrehan16) May 10, 2024

author: Nastya Bobkova
title: √Ä partir de l'ann√©e prochaine, le solde PayPal et les nouvelles options de paiement √©chelonn√© seront disponibles dans Apple Wallet.
text:
Apple a annonc√© l'√©largissement de ses options de paiement √©chelonn√© Apple Pay aux √âtats-Unis et au Royaume-Uni, o√π les utilisateurs peuvent d√©sormais choisir entre Affirm, Monzo Flex et les cr√©dits Klarna lorsqu'ils effectuent des achats en ligne.
Ce que nous savons Ces innovations s'inscrivent dans le cadre de la c√©l√©bration du 10e anniversaire d'Apple Pay. √Ä l'avenir, il est pr√©vu de l'√©tendre √† d'autres pays, notamment l'Australie, Singapour, l'Espagne et le Canada, o√π de nouvelles options de versement propos√©es par des banques locales et des partenaires financiers, notamment Citi, Synchrony, ANZ, DBS, et d'autres, feront √©galement leur apparition.
L'ann√©e prochaine √©galement, les utilisateurs am√©ricains pourront voir leur solde PayPal directement dans Apple Wallet lorsqu'ils utiliseront des cartes de d√©bit PayPal.
Avec Apple Pay, vous pouvez d√©sormais r√©gler vos achats par l'interm√©diaire de navigateurs et d'ordinateurs tiers, ce qui vous permet d'utiliser la technologie avec votre iPhone ou votre iPad pour effectuer des transactions en toute s√©curit√©.
Apple Pay est pris en charge dans 78 pays et est activement utilis√© par des centaines de millions d'utilisateurs dans le monde.

author: Aaron Kasinitz
title: Aaliyah Chavez becomes fifth Texan to earn one of high school basketball's top awards
text:
Add another accolade onto the list for Lubbock Monterey girls basketball star Aaliyah Chavez.
The senior state champion guard won the 2024-25 Gatorade National Player of the Year, the sports drink brand announced Wednesday, marking the fifth time one of most prestigious awards in high school hoops has come to Texas. Cypress native Nneka Ogwumike, the 2007-08 winner of the honor, presented Chavez with the award Wednesday morning in a surprise ceremony at the school.
Chavez, the nation‚Äôs top-ranked Class of 2025 recruit, had already twice won Texas Gatorade Player of the Year. She also earned National Player of the Year honors from the Naismith Awards and MaxPreps over the past month.
In leading the Plainsmen to their first state championship since 1981, Chavez averaged 34.9 points, 9.1 rebounds and 4.3 assists per game this season. Along the way, she developed a large and fervent fan following rare for high school players of any sport.
Chavez plans to announce her college choice Tuesday at Monterey and is considering Texas Tech, Texas, Oklahoma, South Carolina and UCLA.
Before Chavez, four other Texas girls basketball players have won Gatorade National Player of the Year, an award which dates back to 1985. Here‚Äôs the list of Lone Star State winners:
- 2024-25: Guard Aaliyah Chavez, Monterey Lubbock
- 2013-14: Guard/forward Brianna Turner, Manvel
- 2009-10: Forward Chiney Ogwumike, Cy-Fair
- 2007-08: Forward Nneka Ogwumike, Cy-Fair
- 1999-2000: Forward Shereka Wright, Copperas Cove

author: Guardian Nigeria
title: Putin hails women soldiers fighting in Ukraine
text: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday hailed women soldiers fighting in Ukraine and those supporting his country‚Äôs armed forces, in a video message celebrating International Women‚Äôs Day. The Russian leader also issued a decree freeing 52 women prisoners, including those who had relatives in the military. In an address to mark the holiday, Putin said he was paying special tribute to ‚Äúthe women who are in the zone of the special military operation, performing combat tasks.‚Äù Russia calls its full-scale offensive against Ukraine a ‚Äúspecial military operation.‚Äù Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said Friday that more than 300,000 women ‚Äúserve and work in the armed forces.‚Äù Last year he said around 1,100 were ‚Äúfighting‚Äù in Ukraine, suggesting the vast majority are in support roles, such as doctors, nurses and cooks. In a separate video message, Shoigu thanked the mothers of soldiers fighting in Ukraine. ‚ÄúYou have raised true patriots and valiant defenders of the Fatherland,‚Äù he said. Since sending troops into Ukraine in February 2022, Russia has hailed its troops at ‚Äúheroes‚Äù and sought to elevate and protect the military‚Äôs reputation. Hundreds have been prosecuted for ‚Äúdiscrediting‚Äù the armed forces or spreading ‚Äúfalse information‚Äù about the military campaign under strict censorship laws. In recent weeks, a handful of wives of mobilised soldiers have staged rare protests outside the Kremlin calling for their husbands to be rotated out from the frontlines and brought home. 0 Comments [cancel reply](/news/putin-hails-women-soldiers-fighting-in-ukraine/#respond) You must be logged in to post a comment.
